0: To speak ill of another to do harm to him/her.
To do harm to one's value, name, reputation, etc.
To do damage to something by destroying or breaking it.

1: 너무 슬퍼하여 몸이 바짝 마르고 뼈가 앙상하게 드러나다.

0: For harm to be done to one's value, name, reputation, etc.
be damaged; be degraded; be disfigured
For damage to be done to something, being destroyed or broken.
